sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button @click="btnClk">Load Paint</button>
</template>

<script>

export default {
    name: 'LoadButton',
    methods: {
        btnClk() {
            return this.$emit('btnClk');
        }
    }
}

</script>

<style scoped>

button{
    border: 0px white solid;
}

button:hover{
    background: lightgray;
}

</style>
